publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-831 Derek Brownlee: The Wickerman Festival—That the Parliament notes the success of the Wickerman Festival in winning the Best Grass Roots Festival at the UK Festival Awards; notes the contribution that the festival makes to the cultural and economic life of Dumfries and Galloway, and congratulates all involved in the event since its inception in 2002. Supported by: Christine Grahame*, Jamie McGrigor*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Aitken*, Elaine Murray*, Keith Brown*, Alex Johnstone*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Patrick Harvie*, Elizabeth Smith*, Stuart McMillan*, Murdo Fraser*

S3M-831 The Wickerman Festival (lodged on 13 November 2007) John Lamont*, John Scott*, John Wilson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Jim Hume*, Ted Brocklebank*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mary Scanlon*, Patricia Ferguson*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Gillon*
S3M-831 The Wickerman Festival (lodged on 13 November 2007) Kenneth Gibson*

S3M-831 Derek Brownlee: The Wickerman Festival—That the Parliament notes the success of the Wickerman Festival in winning the Best Grass Roots Festival at the UK Festival Awards; notes the contribution that the festival makes to the cultural and economic life of Dumfries and Galloway, and congratulates all involved in the event since its inception in 2002. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Jamie McGrigor, Joe FitzPatrick, Bill Aitken, Elaine Murray, Keith Brown, Alex Johnstone, Bill Kidd, Bob Doris, Patrick Harvie, Elizabeth Smith, Stuart McMillan, Murdo Fraser, John Lamont, John Scott, John Wilson, Jamie Hepburn, Jim Hume, Ted Brocklebank, Alasdair Morgan, Mary Scanlon, Patricia Ferguson, Rob Gibson, Mr Frank McAveety, Karen Gillon, Kenneth Gibson
S3M-831 The Wickerman Festival (lodged on 13 November 2007) Roseanna Cunningham*
